column1: Little Goat Diner////Came here for brunch
column2: and it was amazing. I had a spicy bloody mary
column5: and the breakfast burrito thing on naan. The hash browns weren't super special
column6: but tasted good. The "not Chinese broccoli" was amazing. The burrito was SO GOOD too-- it wasn't like a breakfast burrito at all-- it was like a yummy salad on naan. I'll definitely come back. Good vegetarian options.
